module.name: individual_activity_structure
module.keywords: module, individual, activity, relationship, structure, process plant

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module to record:

ul.li: the decomposition of an activity into component activities;
the involvement of things in activities.

li.p: the existence of an individual activity;
li.note: This capability is provided by the referenced Individual_activity application module.

li.p: a whole-part relationship between two individual activities;
li.note: This capability is provided by the referenced Composition_of_individual_activity application module.

li.p: a connection relationship between two individual activities;
li.note: This capability is provided by the referenced Connection_of_individual_activity application module.

li.p: an involvement of an individual product, document, person, organization or other activity in an individual activity.
li.note: This capability is provided by the referenced Individual_involvement_in_activity application module.
Class of activity is within the scope of the Class_of_activity_structure application module.

li.p: membership of a class of activity.
li.note: Membership of a class of activity is within the scope of the Activity_structure_and_classification application module.

uof.name: individual_activity_structure
uof.description: The individual_activity_structure UOF provides the ability to record information about individual activities and their structure.
